title: AI Quiz: Test Your Knowledge
instructions: Select the best answer for each question. You can change your answers before submitting.

questions.question: What is the primary function of Google Assistant?
options: Recommends movies based on watching history
Recognizes and tags people in photos
Generate human-like text in response to prompts
questions.explanation: Google Assistant is designed to help users with voice commands for various tasks.

questions.question: What does Netflix use AI for?
options: Recommends movies based on watching history
questions.explanation: Netflix uses AI algorithms to analyze your viewing history and recommend content you might enjoy.

questions.question: What is the main AI feature of Facebook's face recognition?
options: Recognizes and tags people in photos
questions.explanation: Facebook uses AI to automatically recognize and suggest tags for people in photos.

questions.question: What is ChatGPT primarily designed to do?
options: Generate human-like text in response to prompts
questions.explanation: ChatGPT is an AI language model that generates human-like text responses to user prompts.

questions.question: How does Tesla use AI technology?
questions.explanation: Tesla uses AI for autonomous driving features and to predict when vehicle maintenance is needed.
